text:
An application for finding any Bluetooth devices has appeared on the iPhone
02 Nov 2019, 18:26 by Artyom Bausov
There is a curious Wunderfind application for searching for any Bluetooth devices.
Its main difference from Latitude is that in percentage it shows the distance to the device. And it doesn't have to be an Apple technique.
You can also play sound, see the latest geolocation, and enable a notification about the location of the gadget.


The app requires GPS and Bluetooth



The home page displays a complete list of unconnected Bluetooth devices nearby

This application is especially good for finding lost AirPods, the sound of which cannot always be heard. But with the help of Bluetooth, you can find out exactly where the headphone is with great accuracy.
Wunderfind is available for free in the App Store, there are built-in purchases. Now the Pro version is available for free.

üëÄ Read also. Everything on the topic
